targets.expr:
sum by (method, endpoint) (increase(backendai_api_request_duration_sec_sum{service_group="$services"}[5m])) 
/
sum by (method, endpoint) (increase(backendai_api_request_duration_sec_count{service_group="$services"}[5m]))

sum by (parent_type, operation_type, operation_name, field_name) (increase(backendai_graphql_request_duration_sec_sum{service_group="$services", success="True"}[5m])) 
/
sum by (parent_type, operation_type, operation_name, field_name) (increase(backendai_graphql_request_duration_sec_count{service_group="$services", success="True"}[5m]))

sum by (parent_type, operation_type, operation_name, field_name) (increase(backendai_graphql_request_duration_sec_sum{service_group="$services", success="False"}[5m])) 
/
sum by (parent_type, operation_type, operation_name, field_name) (increase(backendai_graphql_request_duration_sec_count{service_group="$services", success="False"}[5m]))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(backendai_graphql_request_duration_sec_bucket{service_group="$services", success="True"}) by (le, parent_type, operation_type, operation_name, field_name))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(backendai_graphql_request_duration_sec_bucket{service_group="$services", success="True"}) by (le, parent_type, operation_type, operation_name, field_name))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(backendai_graphql_request_duration_sec_bucket{service_group="$services", success="False"}) by (le, parent_type, operation_type, operation_name, field_name))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(backendai_graphql_request_duration_sec_bucket{service_group="$services", success="False"}) by (le, parent_type, operation_type, operation_name, field_name))

sum by (task_name, status) (increase(backendai_bgtask_processing_time_sec_sum{service_group="$services"}[5m])) 
/
sum by (task_name, status) (increase(backendai_bgtask_processing_time_sec_count{service_group="$services"}[5m]))

sum by (method, endpoint) (increase(backendai_rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum{service_group="$services"}[5m])) 
/
sum by (method, endpoint) (increase(backendai_rpc_request_duration_seconds_count{service_group="$services"}[5m]))
